issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
After installing Titanium SDK 3.5.2.v20150313152423, I can't run my app anymore on Android (both device and genymotion) because the compilation process fails while packaging the app. [Here|http://pastebin.com/BUdQ5pF6] you can see the error trace. 

More: if I roll back my app and my selected sdk version (which worked), I still can't compile.

Note that I need this sdk version in order to be ready when Facebook API v1 will switch off.
fields.summary: Android: failed packaging app after install sdk 3.5.2.v20150313152423
fields.environment:
dev env: MacOSX Yosemite
device: MotoG v1 - Android 5.0.2
emulator: Genymotion (all device an os versions)

comments.body:
Hi,
this error is stuck without activity. Can I help by providing some further information?

[~balanza] can you please add the result of run the commands below in the terminal?
ti info
ti config

Thanks
